Class DbfLogicalField

java.lang.Object
  |

        |
        +--com.esri.mo2.file.shp.DbfLogicalField
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class DbfLogicalField
extends DbfField
implements Cloneable

This class mananges dBASE Logical fields. This field type returns the following object types as output:

  • java.lang.Boolean
  • com.esri.mo2.file.shp.DbfNullValue

This field type accepts the following object types as input:

  • java.lang.Boolean
  • com.esri.mo2.file.shp.DbfNullValue

The default value for this field type is Boolean(false).

Field Summary
static int LOWERCASE_TF
          true/false values will be written to buffer as "t" and "f" respectively

          true/false values will be written to buffer as "y" and "n" respectively

          true/false values will be written to buffer as "T" and "F" respectively
static int UPPERCASE_YN
          true/false values will be written to buffer as "Y" and "N" respectively
